wikipedia_page.main: Jimmy Copeland (23 August 1941 – 23 July 2018) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Kilmarnock, Dumbarton, Montrose and Clyde in the Scottish Football League.Copeland died in July 2018, aged 76.

response: *c.23 July: Jimmy Copeland, 76, Kilmarnock, Dumbarton, Montrose and Clyde forward.Jimmy Copeland
